A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: While this film has one major cringeworthy moment involving Leia pulling a Peter Pan\, and a scene in the middle of the movie that it a nod to PETA and pod-racing\, I actually really enjoyed this film. Rian Johnson did everything we didn't see coming and it worked for me. One or two moments in this film may be the most powerful in the entire saga and John Williams score was at its absolute best!
